ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisRe-appointment of FRANÇOISE BERTRAND, O.C., C.Q., of Montréal, Quebec, as Chairperson of the board of directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months, effective April 12, 2022.
